prompt:
Why has Credit Suisse's stock price been falling on March 20th, 2023?

###
completion: Switzerland’s biggest bank, UBS, has agreed to buy its ailing rival Credit Suisse in an emergency rescue deal aimed at stemming financial market panic unleashed by the failure of two American banks earlier this month. “UBS today announced the takeover of Credit Suisse,” the Swiss National Bank said in a statement Sunday. It said the rescue would “secure financial stability and protect the Swiss economy.” UBS is paying 3 billion Swiss francs ($3.25 billion) for Credit Suisse, about 60% less than the bank was worth when markets closed on Friday. Credit Suisse shareholders will be largely wiped out, receiving the equivalent of just 0.76 Swiss francs in UBS shares for stock that was worth 1.86 Swiss francs on Friday. Owners of $17 billion worth of “additional tier one” bonds — a riskier class of bank debt — will lose everything, Swiss regulators said. Extraordinarily, the deal will not need the approval of shareholders after the Swiss government agreed to change the law to remove any uncertainty about the deal. Credit Suisse (CS) had been losing the trust of investors and customers for years. In 2022, it recorded its worst loss since the global financial crisis. But confidence collapsed last week after it acknowledged “material weakness” in its bookkeeping and as the demise of Silicon Valley Bank and Signature Bank spread fear about weaker institutions at a time when soaring interest rates have undermined the value of some financial assets.

prompt:
Why has UBS bank's stock price risen today, on March 20th, 2023?

###
completion: UBS shares staged a remarkable rally Monday afternoon, reversing steep losses after the bank's 3 billion Swiss franc ($3.2 billion) "emergency rescue" of embattled domestic rival Credit Suisse. The volatility comes shortly after UBS agreed to buy Credit Suisse as part of a cut-price deal in an effort to stem the risk of contagion to the global banking system. The combined bank will be a massive lender, with more than $5 trillion in total invested assets and "sustainable value opportunities," UBS said in a release late Sunday. The bank's chairman, Colm Kelleher, said the acquisition was "attractive" for UBS shareholders.

prompt:
Why is Apple's stock price increasing today, on March 20th, 2023?

###
completion: Tech experts point to a few reasons behind money flowing back into big-cap tech names. The sector's executives have "cleared the deck" in terms of earnings guidance, Wedbush analyst Dan Ives told Yahoo Finance. Cost-cutting from the likes of Meta, Salesforce, Microsoft, and others has set the tech space up to show improved profits later this year. "There are no Sunday night jitters with tech," Ives added.

prompt:
Why are stocks in the tech industry doing so well recently? The day is March 20th, 2023

###
completion: Tech experts point to a few reasons behind money flowing back into big-cap tech names. The sector's executives have "cleared the deck" in terms of earnings guidance, Wedbush analyst Dan Ives told Yahoo Finance. Cost-cutting from the likes of Meta, Salesforce, Microsoft, and others has set the tech space up to show improved profits later this year. "There are no Sunday night jitters with tech," Ives added.

prompt:
Today is March 20th, 2023 What's happening with Microsoft's stock price?.

###
completion: Shares of Microsoft were sliding today, despite an analyst raising his price target for the tech stock and news that the company may be poised to launch a new mobile gaming service. Investors may have ignored those two bits of news and instead exited the stock as part of a larger pullback on tech stocks today on news that Amazon is cutting more jobs.

prompt:
Why has Oatley's stock price risen today, on March 20th, 2023?

###
completion: Shares of oat milk company Oatly jumped on Monday after announcing a partnership with fast-food giant McDonald's. As of noon ET, Oatly stock was up 7%, but it had been up as much as 12% earlier in the day. According to an official press release, Oatly is partnering with McDonald's in Austria.

prompt:
What's happening with New York Community Bankcorp's stock price today, on March 20th, 2023?

###
completion: Flagstar Bank, a subsidiary of New York Community Bancorp, agreed on Sunday to acquire much of what was once Signature Bank. Starting Monday, Signature Bank’s 40 branches will operate under Flagstar Bank. Signature Bank collapsed just over a week ago, days after Silicon Valley Bank faced the same fate. Shares of New York Community Bancorp also were upgraded to Outperform from Neutral by analysts at Wedbush. Shares were rising 34.7%.

prompt:
It's March 20th, 2023. Why is Bed Bath and Beyond's stock price tumbling?

###
completion: Shares of Bed Bath & Beyond Inc. tumbled Monday below the $1 level, a 30-year low, after the struggling home-goods retailer said it planned to hold a special meeting in which shareholders would vote on whether to allow the company to carry out a reverse stock split, should its board decide to do so. Shareholder approval would amend Bed Bath & Beyond’s certificate of incorporation to carry out “a reverse stock split of the company’s common stock,” at a ratio in the range of 1-for-5 to 1-for-10. The ratio of the split will be determined by the retailer’s board of directors. The time and location of the meeting will be announced later, the company said.

prompt:
Why has Franchise Group's stock been rising so much today, on March 20th, 2023?

###
completion: Franchise Group, Inc. today announced that it has received an unsolicited non-binding proposal, which is subject to certain conditions, to acquire all of the outstanding shares of the common stock of the Company for a price of $30.00 per share in cash. The Board of Directors will carefully evaluate the proposal to determine the course of action that it believes is in the best interests of the Company and all FRG stockholders. The Company makes no assurance that the proposal will result in a transaction.

prompt:
Tech stocks have been doing well today, on March 20th, 2023, but not Amazon's. Why is that?

###
completion: Amazon.com shares fell 2.1% after the online retailer and tech giant said it plans to cut another 9,000 jobs, following a previous round of 18,000 layoffs announced in January.

prompt:
Why has Dell's stock price been performing well today, on March 20th, 2023?

###
completion: Dell Technologies shares rose 3% after analysts at Goldman Sachs initiated coverage on the stock with a Buy recommendation.

prompt:
Why has Foot Locker's stock price dropped on March 20th, 2023?

###
completion: Foot Locker’s profit forecast for this year came in lower than expectedThe retailer of athletic shoes on Monday said for fiscal 2023, which ends on Feb. 3, 2024, adjusted earnings are expected to be $3.35 per share to $3.65 per share—lower than the $4.11 per share analysts tracked by FactSet were expecting.

prompt:
Why did Carnival Corp's stock leap today, on March 20th, 2023?

###
completion: Shares of Carnival Corp. surged Monday, after Deutsche Bank analyst Chris Woronka made a short-term recommendation to buy, a week before the cruise operator reports fiscal first-quarter results.Carnival’s stock bounced 2.7% in midday trading, after closing at a 2 ½-month low on Friday. It outperformed its peers as shares of Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. fell 0.7%, after news that its chief executive officer was stepping down, and shares of Royal Caribbean Group edged up 0.6%.

prompt:
How has Home Depot's stock performed today, on March 20th, 2023?

###
completion: Nothing notable happened to Home Depot's stock today, so it's difficult to make any conclusions about the behavior of its stock price in the short term.

prompt:
Has anything happened to Chipotle's stock today, on March 20th, 2023?

###
completion: Nothing significant in the short-term has happened to Chipotle's stock price.

prompt:
Today is March 20th, 2023. What changes have happened recently in Tesla's stock price?

###
completion: Shares popped 5% after Moody’s upgraded Tesla to Baa3 rating from its junk-rated credit. Moody’s called the electric-vehicle maker the “foremost manufacturers of battery electric vehicles” and said the upgrade reflects Tesla’s prudent financial policy and management’s operational track record.

prompt:
Today is March 21st, 2023. How has the banking industry been doing lately in terms of stock price?

###
completion: Regional bank stocks rebounded on Tuesday as Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said the government would consider backstopping deposits at more banks in order to protect the financial system. Shares of First Republic jumped more than 41%, while KeyCorp added 9%. U.S. Bancorp rose nearly 8%. Shares of larger U.S. banks rose on Tuesday as investors showed increased optimism after Yellen’s remarks. JPMorgan gained about 3% and Bank of America rose by 3.5%.

prompt:
Why did Foot Locker's stock increase on March 21st?

###
completion: Foot Locker gained 6% after Citi upgraded the retail stock to a buy from neutral after its investor day on Monday. The firm said the company’s move away from malls and toward digital, kids and loyalty projects is a step in the right direction.

prompt:
Why did Harley-Davidson's stock price jump on March 21st?

###
completion: Shares of Harley-Davidson rose more than 5% after Morgan Stanley upgraded the motorcycle maker and said its focus on its core business can lift the stock by more than 30%. Jefferies also upgraded the stock, saying the company’s risk and reward are more balanced after a recent decline.

prompt:
Why did UBS Bank's stock continue to increase on March 21st?

###
completion: U.S.-listed shares of the Swiss-based bank gained 12% during midday trading following its agreement over the weekend to buy Credit Suisse for $3.2 billion. Credit Suisse rose 5% after taking a nearly 53% plunge on Monday.

prompt: Emerson Electric's stock price increased on March 21st. Why is that?
completion: Shares added nearly 2% after Morgan Stanley said shares of the multinational tech company are too attractive to ignore. The firm upgraded the stock to overweight from equal weight.

prompt:
Why did Nvidia's stock increase on March 22nd? How does the future look for Nvidia?

###
completion: Shares of Nvidia are set to surge on the chipmaker's dominant position in the growing field of artificial intelligence, Bank of America analysts wrote this week.  The stock has upside potential of about 14% from Wednesday's intraday high around $271, with the bank assigning a price target of $310 per share. That view is based on factors related to the company's growing lead in the AI and large language model (LLM) space, areas which have generated huge interest from investors so far in 2023. "NVDA's combination of scale and vision to invest in a full-stack, turnkey (hardware, software, systems, services, developers) model could accelerate the adoption of LLMs by enterprises in almost every end-market," the BofA analysts said. They added that their view is shared by some of the titans of the tech world, including Google, Microsoft, Oracle, and Amazon, which all view partnerships with Nvidia as a way of effectively rolling out AI and LLM applications. The bank said Nvidia represents a "democratizing opportunity" for the technology.

prompt:
Why did Nvidia's stock price leap on March 22nd?

###
completion: Nvidia shares gained nearly 3% midday, building on their recent outperformance. Wall Street analysts lauded the company's artificial intelligence leadership following its developer conference Tuesday. The chipmaker unveiled a host of new products and partnerships that lifted confidence in its capabilities.

prompt:
Why did GameStop's stock price shoot up on March 22nd, 2023?

###
completion: GameStop shares are surging after the struggling video game retailer reported its first profitable quarter in two years. The Texas-based retailer on Tuesday reported a net profit of $48.2 million for the fourth quarter ending on Dec. 31, compared with a loss of $147.5 million in the year-ago period, according to a regulatory filing.

prompt: First Republic Bank's stocks have been dropping for the past fews days. Why have they continued to drop today, on March 22nd, 2023?
completion: Shares of the regional bank were down 4.5% midday trading on Wednesday. The bank has been exploring different strategic options, including a possible sale, after massive deposit outflows in the wake of the collapse of Silicon Valley Bank.

prompt:
Why did Nike's stock slide on March 22nd, 2023?

###
completion: Shares of the sportswear retailer fell 2% even after the company easily beat Wall Street's estimates for its holiday quarter earnings and revenue. Nike, which has been contending with a glut of inventory and weak China sales, said it is taking a "cautious approach" to planning, given worries about the consumer and the economy.

prompt:
Why did PacWest's stock drop on March 22nd, 2023?

###
completion: The company's stock dropped after PacWest said its plans to raise new capital "would not be prudent" given "current volatility in the market and depressed market prices for regional bank stocks". PacWest Bancorp shares slumped lower in pre-market trading after the lender said dumped plans to raise fresh capital but secured a new round of senior funding, suggesting pressures on regional banks will continue to affect markets.

prompt:
Why did Charles Shwab's stock price drop on March 22nd, 2023?

###
completion: Charles Schwab shares fell 4% after Barclays lowered its price target on the financial stock to $61 from $79, citing near-term earnings power concerns as it grapples with the ripple effects of Silicon Valley Bank's collapse.

prompt:
Today is March 22nd, 2023. Why did Petco's stock decrease today?

###
completion: Shares fell 13% after the company reported earnings. Adjusted earnings came in at 23 cents per share, one cent below the consensus estimate of analysts polled by FactSet. Revenue came in line with expectations at $1.58 billion.

prompt:
Why did Boeing's shares lose value on March 22nd, 2023?

###
completion: Boeing Co shares are trading lower Wednesday following the company's presentation at the Bank of America Global Industrials Conference. Comments from CFO Brian West appear to be weighing on the stock. West spoke at a BofA conference Tuesday morning and touched on several financial targets. West laid out expectations for the planemaker to deliver between 70 and 80 787 Dreamliners in 2023 and noted that 737s are being ramped up but are "not there yet," according to Benzinga Pro. The Boeing CFO warned that commercial unit margins are likely to decline in the first quarter versus the fourth quarter and noted that the company also expects lower volumes. West did reiterate Boeing's 2023 free cash flow goal of $3 billion to $5 billion.

prompt:
Why did Luminar Technology's stock price drop on March 22nd, 2023?

###
completion: Shares sank 11% after being downgraded to sell from neutral by Goldman Sachs. The Wall Street firm believes the self-driving car software stock is too expensive and could fall 35% from Tuesday's close.

prompt: Why did Krispy Kreme's stock rise on March 22nd, 2023?
completion: Shares of Krispy Kreme added to earlier gains, climbing 7%. Shares of the doughnut maker rose after Truist upgraded the stock to buy from hold with an adjusted price target of $20 per share. The firm highlighted "meaningful volume growth" in the year ahead, potential FX benefits abroad and future in-store boosts from a deal with McDonald's.

prompt: Why did Virgin Orbit's stock price increase on March 22nd, 2023?
completion: Shares in the space launch start-up Virgin Orbit were soaring because the company is getting back to work. Virgin Orbit initiated a “company-wide operating pause” on March 16 to preserve cash while looking for funding sources and strategic partners. Shares fell 30% that day in response to the news.

completion: Nothing notable happened to Nintendo's stock today, so it's difficult to make any conclusions about the behavior of its stock price in the short term.
